entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow changing to snow near midnight and ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:27 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
